name: 丹妮·海芙琳

last_movies.title: 舞出我人生：浪潮 第二季

introduction: Nicknames	DanielleDanniMini Bio (1)Danni Heverin was raised in a military family moving all over the world until finally settling down in Alabama at the age of 13. Dance grounded her and she always felt at home in any dance studio. She attended and graduated from the University of Alabama with a BA in Dance and Business. While in College she balanced school and her passion for entertaining while having the opportunity to perform on the CMT, and two CMA Country Christmas and CMA Awards shows. She also appeared on the TV show Nashville and in 3 movies; The Identical, Let's Be Cops, and Million Dollar Arm. She auditioned for The Radio City Rockettes and was offered and accepted the job in August 2014. Always wanting to entertain and perform for an audience she has made her dream a reality. Living in Atlanta during the Rockettes off season, working on her dance, entertainment and fitness career.
